sentences.en: Antidepressants, opioids , anticonvulsants, and psychotherapy are used for treatment of chronic pain.
sentences.cn: 可用抗抑郁药, 类罂粟碱, 抗惊厥药治疗慢性疼痛.

sentences.en: Did you learn that in your psychotherapy group?
sentences.cn: 你是不是从心理治疗小组那里学到的?

sentences.en: Do not ridicule the use of words in psychotherapy.
sentences.cn: 不要嘲笑言辞在心理治疗当中的的用途.

sentences.en: For milder depressions, certain forms of psychotherapy do work well.
sentences.cn: 对较轻微的抑郁症，某些形式的心理治疗效果的确不错。

sentences.en: I'll also sketch out some comparisons between existential psychotherapy and religious consolation.
sentences.cn: 我还想对存在主义心理治疗和宗教慰藉做些简要的对比.

sentences.en: Insomnia and depression are diseases suitable for treatment by psychotherapy.
sentences.cn: 失眠、抑郁是心理疗法的适应症.

sentences.en: It may range from medication and surgery to counseling and psychotherapy.
sentences.cn: 可能从药物治疗、外科手术到心理谘询和心理疗法等等.

sentences.en: Most psychotherapy is primarily verbal but expressive arts therapy is also non - verbal.
sentences.cn: 大部分的心理治疗主要用“口语”,而表达艺术用的是” 非 口语”.

sentences.en: Object To explore the effect of Eclectic Psychotherapy in agoraphobia.
sentences.cn: 目的探索综合心理疗法对场所恐惧症的效果.

sentences.en: Objective : To study the effect of psychotherapy on elder cancer patients.
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究心理行为干预对老年肿瘤病人生存质量的影响.

sentences.en: Part Four examines applications and modifications of psychotherapy across the lifecycle.
sentences.cn: 检查穿过生存周期的心理疗法的敷用和修改.

sentences.en: Psychotherapy consists of three common factors: therapist, client and therapy process.
sentences.cn: 心理治疗有三个共同因素即: 治疗者 、 来访者和治疗过程.

sentences.en: The Kaleses use moderate afternoon exercise, along with psychotherapy and biofeedback, to treat severe insomniacs.
sentences.cn: 两位凯利斯用不太剧烈的午后运动, 结合精神疗法及机能反馈疗法, 来治疗严重的失眠患者.

sentences.en: Their differences can be seen from their divergent conceptions on psychotherapy.
sentences.cn: 两者之间的差异性,由彼此对于心理治疗之构想的不同可见一斑.

sentences.en: There is not apare technique of hearing and saying in psychotherapy.
sentences.cn: 心理治疗并不存在纯粹的倾听与言说技术.

words.tran_cn: 精神性欲的；有性特性的
心理物理学；精神物理学
心理生理学；精神生理学

trans.tran_en: the treatment of mental illness, for example  depression  , by talking to someone and discussing their problems rather than giving them drugs
